scripts.typegen: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude 'sample-apps/*' --exclude '.' --verbose run graphql-code-generator --config package.json
scripts.test-js: yarn expand-liquid vanilla-js && yarn workspaces foreach --exclude 'sample-apps/*' --exclude '.' --verbose run test run
scripts.test-ts: yarn expand-liquid typescript && yarn workspaces foreach --exclude 'sample-apps/*' --exclude '.' --verbose run test run
